subject: Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Charles Scheeler, the man brought in to monitor Penn State’s athletics program after a scandal, said his role would soon end because he believed the university had made sufficient progress.
snippet: Charles Scheeler, the man brought in to monitor Penn State’s athletics program after a scandal, said his role would soon end because he believed the university had made sufficient progress.
